title: Anaklusmos
desc:
Post 2211
- You may change between a *Pen* or *Sword* on your turn
- While it is a *Sword*, you may discard a card when drawing a card, but players may choose to redirect the effects of their card to you (even if for some reason they could not)
- While it is a *Pen*, every two turns you may change the number of the last played card before a card is played
